item.title: 1 Error
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Mmk, I was simply adding this tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,140342.0.html
I added everything no errors, except this 1 part on Step 2…

The part where it says to search else if(useItemID and then above, add this code: else if(useItemID == 4273 && atObjectID == 5162) { deleteItem(4273, getItemSlot(4273), 1); sendMessage("Gratz , Round 1 is done 4 rounds left"); SummonNewNPC(2880); } else if(useItemID == 5585 && atObjectID == 5162) { deleteItem(5585, getItemSlot(5585), 1); sendMessage("Gratz , Round 2 is done 3 rounds left"); SummonNewNPC(49); } else if (useItemID == 4272 && atObjectID == 5162) { deleteItem(4272, getItemSlot(4272), 1); sendMessage("Gratz , Round 3 is done 2 rounds left"); SummonNewNPC(795); } else if(useItemID == 4078 && atObjectID == 5162) { deleteItem(4078, getItemSlot(4078), 1); sendMessage("Gratz , Round 4 done , 1 round left - Prepare your for the big fight .."); SummonNewNPC(509); } else if(useItemID == 6104 && atObjectID == 5162) { deleteItem(6104, getItemSlot(6104), 1); sendMessage("Gratz , You are awarded your fighter torso now :D"); addItem(6384,1); }

Well, I did that, I had 4 errors, then I removed the bracket above start of this code ^^^ now only 1 error…and my error is this:

[code]client.java:14536: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if(useItemID == 4273 && atObjectID == 5162) {
^
1 error

Stranded Isle Has Been Compiled SuccesFully !

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thanks if any of you can help.
Btw, before any of you say, “Oh, just remove the else or if…” It’s not that, i tried it.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 07:40:19 PM[/size][hr]Come on…please guys, I need help.

Read full topic
